thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 11 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zhuzhou Kibing To Invest In Glass Project, Chairman Resigns

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhuzhou Kibing To Invest In Glass Project, Chairman Resigns

organizations.name: reuters) - zhuzhou kibing group co ltd

text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Zhuzhou Kibing Group Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT PLANS TO INVEST 372 MILLION YUAN ($57.16 million) IN GLASS PRODUCTION PROJECT
* SAYS CHAIRMAN GE WENYAO RESIGNS DUE TO PERSONAL REASONS, PRESIDENT ZHANG BAIZHONG DEPUTISES Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2CQ9CWt ; bit.ly/2CRVEU5 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.5086 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
